name: James Choi
review: enjoyable water park  hot spring  outdoor and indoor pool  sauna are available when i went here at night spa time

name: Emmett L
review: tuesday 16 04 2019 the fire in the area burnt right up to the main entrance  alot of the outside pools were damaged and all the outside rides were not working  but the people there and the staff were amazing  really helpful and cheerful  we went to ride the maestrom ride but you need 4 people for it  we were only two so two of the staff jumped in  my son loved it  thanks

name: Yingying
review: pretty decent waterpark for summer in korea  the facilities are okay  there is also a sauna which is pretty cool  there are also food and drinks available  i had wonderful churros and green tea latte at some random cafe near the changing room

name: Kameron Colbert
review: some things closed until 7 17  would be more fun for older kids if everything was open  facility was nice   water masks for covid doesnt make sense

name: Abdullah Al Marouf
review: wow  its amazing  at the first time i really shocked to ride on the waterpia  people from different ages  areas are enjoying this incredibly  seorak waterpia is very clean and well organized  the infrastructure and interior design of the building is very attractive  transportation of this area is very easy  staffs are so friendly and professional  my experience is always great here  i wanna go again

name: Moses Choi
review: quite a large water park  but a bit dated  there are a few hallways and walkways that are now closed and seem like they haven t been used quite awhile  however  there are a lot of pools and water rides for all ages  the lazy river is great for kids and families  we thought that the water park was connected to the nearby resort  but it turns out that it is not  so you must remember to bring a change of clothes if you come here  the sauna facilities are large and have a lot of open space to relax after a long day of playing in the water

name: Nikki Sandschaper
review: the water is perfect and the rides are fun  there are some food and ice cream options  if you have a swim shirt  pants  cap  and or shoes    bring them  most people will be quite covered since sunscreen is not allowed in the spring water

name: jenny chau
review: we re here because the tour is included   what we ve been told we re here for hot natural spring  to be honest  at first  i choose the one could wear a swimming suit   then when i went in  it s like a big pool with warm water  not a natural spring at all  then i recalled our tour guide  said we could go to the   naked  one  which is much hotter  then i went there  they call it sauna spa  and the introduction is all korean  i m not sure if this is a natural spring   but there re so many tub with different temperatures   like 39 degrees   or 45 degrees  also  there s one outdoor too  even i m not sure if its natural spring   but it really feels good  my naked experience is worth it

name: Emmanuel Perez
review: not much in the winter season  the indoor pools and sauna area is open  the rides and everything else outside are closed  during the summer should be a lot better but way more crowded

name: Julie Sohn
review: korea has some of the best water parks in the world  it s far better than great wolf lodge  they have indoor buildings devoted to nothing but water spas with powerful jets lining coves and special seats built into a giant  clear water pool

name: Brandon Tang
review: the place is alright  kitchen had a slight after stench of kimchi  we were also told we cannot wear shoes in our rooms   one neat thing is our floor room seemed to  have heated floors  cannot confirm that but it certainly felt like it

name: J L
review: seorak waterpia   bring your own swimming cap or baseball cap  you must wear it when you are in the pools or spa pools  there are not so many water slides  like the ones in caribbean bay waterpark of everland  in here  it is best to come to this area in autumn to look at the beautiful maple trees and enjoy the outdoor spa pools here   the current of the warm water outdoor lazy river is fast  quite fun   not sure if it is open when it is winter

name: Andrey Serditov
review: a great place to relax with the whole family  attentive staff  thoughtful  varied  adventurous  magnificent water park  a lot of all sorts of water notions and attractions for children  relaxing treatments for adults  in the evening  an interesting entertainment show program  very cozy and friendly atmosphere of the whole complex  impressions are the most vivid and unforgettable  want more

name: Jan-Michael Buckowitz
review: although seorak waterpia is one of the oldest water parks in korea  it has been continually expanded and modernized over time  on a huge area there are partly covered baths   such as wave pool  pool for toddlers  swimming pool for larger    food stalls  where you can buy typical korean snacks as well as hot dogs or hamburgers  the outdoor area of the facility offers various pools where the water is provided with a current  so that it is easy  almost without swimming movements  to be carried only by the flow through the twisting waterway  also wave baths  a variety of whirlpools  pools with water temperatures of 40 degrees celsius  a huge family pool where visitors are encouraged to do gymnastics  the highlights are 3 water slides  1 of them leisurely  the next larger already much faster and steeper  topped by the largest  which offers a real kick  overall  a real experience  at the moment  the bath in the outskirts is being rebuilt structurally  it is also remarkable how the safety is taken care of  so that you can go with children safely  about every 20 meters there is a lifeguard  overall  really worth a day s stay  best visit during the week  the rush is enormous  for europeans it is certainly very unusual  especially the entrance area  since there are no changing rooms  you will find the section for women and men  moved to coram publico  just as the shower is done naked after the bath and before the eyes of other same sex people  but this is a topic that actually requires a separate rubric  because the sexuality in korea differs significantly from the european  there are many pitfalls for visitors from abroad      seorak waterpia ist zwar eines der  ltesten erlebnisb der koreas  es wurde aber immer wieder im laufe der zeit erweitert und modernisiert  auf einem riesigen gel nde finden sich teils  berdachte b der   wie wellenbad  becken f r kleinkinder  schwimmbecken f r gr  ere      essensst nde  wo sie neben typisch koreanischen snacks auch hotdogs oder hamburger kaufen k nnen  der au enbereich der anlage bietet verschiedene becken  in denen das wasser mit einer str mung versehen wird  so dass man m helos  fast ohne schwimmbewegungen nur von der str mung durch die verwundene wasserstra e getragen wird  auch hier wellenb der  eine vielzahl von whirlpools  becken mit wassertemperaturen von 40 grad celsius  ein riesiges familienbecken  in dem die besucher zu gymnastik angeregt werden  als highlights finden sich 3 wasserrutschen  1 davon gem chlich  die n chst gr  ere schon deutlich schneller und steiler  getoppt von der gr  ten  die einen echten kick bietet  insgesamt ein echtes erlebnis  zur zeit wird das bad im randgebiet wieder baulich erweitert  bemerkenswert auch  wie sich um die sicherheit gesorgt wird  so dass man unbesorgt mit kindern hingehen kann  ca  alle 20 meter findet sich ein e rettungsschwimmer in  insgesamt wirklich einen tag aufenthalt wert  am besten unter der woche besuchen  der andrang ist enorm  f r europ er ist es sicherlich sehr ungewohnt  vor allem der eingangsbereich  da es keine umkleidekabinen gibt  sie finden den bereich f r frauen und den f r m nner  umgezogen wird sich in coram publico  genauso wie die dusche nach dem bad nackt und vor den augen der anderen gleichgeschlechtlichen personen vollzogen wird   aber das ist ein thema  das eigentlich eine eigene rubrik erfordert   denn die sexualit t in korea unterscheidet sich wesentlich von der europ ischen  hier gibt es viele fallstricke f r besucher aus dem ausland
